title: Decrypted text exposed in memory for UI preview
description: Decrypted clipboard text stored in Swift String for UI preview. String is immutable and cannot be zeroed. Implement lazy decryption with SecurePreview pattern. See v0.2-implementation-plan.md Phase 3. Requires Xcode.

title: No Touch ID/biometric authentication
description: No Touch ID/Face ID authentication. Any user with physical access can view clipboard history. Implement LocalAuthentication with Touch ID/password fallback. See v0.2-implementation-plan.md Phase 4. Requires Xcode.

title: Move IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md to history/ directory
close_reason: Moved IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md to history/ directory per AGENTS.md guidance

title: Missing entitlements file in worktree
close_reason: Verified - entitlements file exists at VaultClip/VaultClip.entitlements with correct sandbox config

title: Xcode not installed - cannot build/test prototype
description: Xcode is not installed on this system. Only Command Line Tools are available. This blocks building and testing the v0.1 prototype. Install Xcode 15.2+ from Mac App Store or developer.apple.com to proceed with code implementation and testing.

title: Missing screen recording protection (documented limitation)
description: Screen recording/screenshots can capture clipboard content. Implement NSWindow.sharingType = .none and accessibility API protection. See v0.2-implementation-plan.md Phase 1 for detailed implementation. Requires Xcode.

title: No automated build/test CI workflow
close_reason: Created comprehensive GitHub Actions CI workflow with security checks, build/test, and documentation verification

title: Clipboard data not persisted (in-memory only)
description: Clipboard data stored in-memory only. History cleared on app quit. Implement encrypted SQLite database with per-item keys. See v0.2-implementation-plan.md Phase 5. Requires Xcode.

title: Create v0.2 implementation plan addressing P1 security issues
close_reason: Created comprehensive v0.2 implementation plan addressing all P1 security issues

title: No code signing verification tests
close_reason: Created comprehensive code signing verification script with CI integration

title: No Package.swift for SPM build support
description: Create Package.swift for Swift Package Manager build support. This enables building without Xcode (swift build) and integration into other SPM projects. Should be created after v0.2 stabilizes to avoid churn during refactoring. Priority 3 - nice to have but not critical.

title: Security requirements doc has no implementation tracking
Memory protection uses memset_s but no mlock for swap prevention
description: Memory protection uses memset_s but no mlock(). Sensitive data may be written to swap file. Implement SecureMemory wrapper with mlock/munlock. See v0.2-implementation-plan.md Phase 2. Requires Xcode.
